traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Karavarix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Karavarix can't bite a different target.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. 10 (1d8 + 6 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cataclysmic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a wave of ghostly purple flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8 damage) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature dies if the breath reduces it to 0 hit points. Additionally, any Medium or smaller Humanoid killed by the breath's damage, as well as every corpse of such a creature within the cone, becomes a zombie (see the Monster Manual) under Karavarix's control. The zombie acts on Karavarix's initiative but immediately after Karavarix's turn. Absent any other command, the zombie tries to kill any non-Undead creature it encounters.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The dragon makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Cataclysmic Rush (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon moves up to half its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks, carrying with it any creatures it is grappling. During this move, if it enters the space of a Medium or smaller creature, that creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.
